name: SpaceShootREMAKEVer
description:
Zoom Smaller Your Explorer for best view of game.

This is the Remake Version of SpaceShooterNewBieVer.

Remake version :
 - StartUp and Main Menu scene added
 - considerable Game_UI added
 - idle Animation in main menu added
 - Volume and SFX volume can be adjusted
 - Enemy  HP and Player HP added
 - Pause function added
